Reviews.Title: “Fine as a base as long as you'll be out a lot”
Reviews.Author: Fatyak
Reviews.Content: found hotel location 10 minutes walk kings cross near bloomsbury nice pubs shabby clean en suite plastic pod 70s except taps dripped loudly night couldnt switch value money considering central location staff helpful indication breakfast fry greys inn road looking base hotel fine
